title: Replace X social link with YouTube in Contact Follow Us section

requirements.summary: Replace the X (Twitter) social icon/link in the Contact page Follow Us section with a YouTube icon/link to the provided channel URL, keeping styling and accessibility intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The "Follow Us" row no longer includes an item labeled "X" / "X (Twitter)" and does not render the X icon.
A YouTube icon/link is present in the same position/group as the other social icons.
Clicking the YouTube icon opens https://youtube.com/@myplaceatqueretaro?si=FI8rt31Wp4dxLMY2 in a new tab.
The YouTube link uses safe external link attributes (target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer").
The YouTube link has an accessible aria-label indicating "YouTube" (or equivalent clear label).

file_operations.description: Update the Follow Us socialLinks array to remove the existing X (Twitter) item and add a YouTube item pointing to https://youtube.com/@myplaceatqueretaro?si=FI8rt31Wp4dxLMY2; replace the SiX import with the appropriate YouTube icon import from react-icons/si, ensure aria-label is clearly "YouTube", and preserve existing link attributes (target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer") and styling/hover/focus behavior.
